healthcare.description: Limited AI deployment in diagnostics and health records. Maroc IA 2030 targets AI for rural healthcare access and telemedicine.

agriculture.description: Precision agriculture pilots in the Plan Maroc Vert successor (Generation Green). Potential for AI in irrigation, crop monitoring, and supply chain.

education.description: JAZARI AI Institutes planned for AI education. Adaptive learning platforms in pilot phase.

finance.description: Banks deploying AI for credit scoring and fraud detection. Bank Al-Maghrib exploring RegTech. Most advanced sector for AI adoption.

public-services.description: E-government digitization ongoing. AI for citizen services, document processing, and administrative efficiency under Digital Morocco 2030.

law-enforcement.description: Limited known deployment. Surveillance and border security applications potential but sensitive.

employment.description: HR tech market nascent. Recruitment AI tools used by multinationals operating in Morocco.

regulatory_context.data_protection_authority: CNDP (Commission Nationale de Contrôle de la Protection des Données à Caractère Personnel)
international_commitments: EU-Morocco Association Agreement (trade implications for AI regulation alignment)

economic_context.notes: SMEs dominate the economy; compliance costs must be proportionate. Significant informal sector may be outside regulatory reach.
